languages.text: "Мы будем играть в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g}, а вместо фигур используем стопки {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g}. Правила простые: кто съел "фигуру" оппонента — выпивает ее. Первый ход ваш!"

"We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"
languages.original_text: "Мы будем играть в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g}, а вместо фигур используем стопки {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g}. Правила простые: кто съел "фигуру" оппонента — выпивает ее. Первый ход ваш!"

traits.locale_text: "We will enjoy ourselves a game of regicide, but instead of pieces, we will be using shots of amasec. The rules are simple: you take the opponent's 'piece,' you drink the piece. Yours is the first move!"

"We will enjoy ourselves a game of regicide, but instead of pieces, we will be using shots of amasec. The rules are simple: you take the opponent's 'piece,' you drink the piece. Yours is the first move!"
"We will play a game of regicide... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of amasec. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece', you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"
"We will play a game of regicide... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of amasec. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece', you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

"We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

"We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

languages.text: « Nous allons jouer au {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g}... en remplaçant les pièces par des verres d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Les règles sont simples : chaque fois que vous prenez l'une des "pièces" de l'adversaire, vous devez boire le verre. {mf|Prêt|Prête} ? Alors, que la partie commence ! »
languages.original_text: "We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons jouer au régicide... en remplaçant les pièces par des verres d'amasec. Les règles sont simples : chaque fois que vous prenez l'une des "pièces" de l'adversaire, vous devez boire le verre. {mf|Prêt|Prête} ? Alors, que la partie commence ! »

« Nous allons jouer au régicide... en remplaçant les pièces par des verres d'amasec. Les règles sont simples : chaque fois que vous prenez l'une des "pièces" de l'adversaire, vous devez boire le verre. {mf|Prêt|Prête} ? Alors, que la partie commence ! »

languages.text: «Jugaremos una partida de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g}... pero, en lugar de piezas, usaremos chupitos de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Las reglas no tienen nada: cuando capture la "pieza" de su oponente, se la bebe. ¿List{mf|o|a}? ¡A jugar!».
languages.original_text: "We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

traits.locale_text: «Jugaremos una partida de regicidio... pero, en lugar de piezas, usaremos chupitos de amasec. Las reglas no tienen nada: cuando capture la "pieza" de su oponente, se la bebe. ¿List{mf|o|a}? ¡A jugar!».

languages.text: “我们可以玩一局{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}……但用的不是普通的棋子，而是装满{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}的酒杯。规则很简单，吃掉对手的棋子时，要把那杯酒也一口喝光。准备好了吗？咱们开始吧！”
languages.original_text: "We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

traits.locale_text: “我们可以玩一局弑君棋……但用的不是普通的棋子，而是装满艾玛赛克酒的酒杯。规则很简单，吃掉对手的棋子时，要把那杯酒也一口喝光。准备好了吗？咱们开始吧！”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}のゲームをしましょう….しかし、駒の代わりに、{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}のショットを使います。ルールは簡単です。相手の『駒』を捕獲したら、ショットを一杯飲みます。準備はいいですか？レッツ・プレイ！」
languages.original_text: "We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

traits.locale_text: 「レジサイドのゲームをしましょう….しかし、駒の代わりに、アマセックのショットを使います。ルールは簡単です。相手の『駒』を捕獲したら、ショットを一杯飲みます。準備はいいですか？レッツ・プレイ！」

languages.text: "Wir spielen eine Partie {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g} ... aber statt Spielfiguren verwenden wir kleine Gläser {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}. Die Regeln sind simpel. Wenn man eine 'Spielfigur' des Gegners schlägt, muss man ein Glas trinken. Bereit? Dann spielen wir!"
languages.original_text: "We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir spielen eine Partie Königsmord ... aber statt Spielfiguren verwenden wir kleine Gläser Amasec. Die Regeln sind simpel. Wenn man eine 'Spielfigur' des Gegners schlägt, muss man ein Glas trinken. Bereit? Dann spielen wir!"

"Wir spielen eine Partie Königsmord ... aber statt Spielfiguren verwenden wir kleine Gläser Amasec. Die Regeln sind simpel. Wenn man eine 'Spielfigur' des Gegners schlägt, muss man ein Glas trinken. Bereit? Dann spielen wir!"

languages.text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}kral katili{/g} oyunu oynayacağız ama... Taşlar yerine {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} şatları kullanacağız. Kurallar basit: Rakibinin taşını ele geçirirsen şat atmak zorundasın. Hazır mısın? Hadi başlayalım!"
languages.original_text: "We will play a game of {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g}... but instead of pieces, we will use shots of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. The rules are simple — when you capture an opponent's 'piece,' you have to take a shot. Ready? Let's play!"
